item.title: What is SQL now?
item.description: What is SQL now? SQL is Esperanto in the data world. But unlike “Lingwe Uniwersala” SQL was reached world popularity and wide spreading. Initialy SQL was invented in 70’s special for databases. Even then it creators was aimed to create a simple and powerfull data language for wide range of users, with not only IT background, such as engineers, scientists, researchers, analytics, managers etc. SQL first of all was made by humans for humans, not for machines.
